meanings.definition: A device used for hanging clothes.
meanings.sent1: I need more hangers to hang up all my shirts.
meanings.sent2: The store sells colorful hangers for organizing your closet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the hangers, pretending they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the empty room, like hangers clinking together in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hangers tapping against the metal rod filled the quiet room.

meanings.sent1: The hangers at the art gallery carefully placed each painting on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The hangers in the theater ensured the curtains were perfectly straight.
meanings.sent3: The hangers in the movie set joked about who could hang the props the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was the hangers of the family, always putting up decorations for every holiday.
meanings.sent5: The skilled hangers delicately hung the chandelier in the grand ballroom.

meanings.sent1: The old barn had sturdy hangers for storing tools and equipment.
meanings.sent2: The garden shed had various hangers for hanging gardening supplies.
meanings.sent3: The children turned the treehouse into a secret hangers for their treasures.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky resembled fluffy hangers holding up the sun.
meanings.sent5: The bridge across the river had decorative hangers for hanging flower baskets.
